item.title: Introduction
item.description: R Markdown Welcome! I am a recent PhD graduate and aspiring Data Scientist, based in Cambridge, UK. A bit about me - I completed my PhD in Statistics and Operational Research at the STOR-i Centre for Doctoral Training, looking at a variety of areas in time-series forecasting, including linking forecasts to inventory management, hierarchical forecasting, and modelling multiple seasonalities and calendar effects (like Christmas/Bank Holidays) in a retail setting. You can find my thesis here.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
